channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Meta’s New Vanguard Smart Glasses Have More Advanced Features Than Its Ray-Ban Specs
item.description: The range of smart glasses now has a new model, Oakley Meta Vanguard, performance AI glasses designed for high-intensity sports.

item.title: Freepik’s Spaces Makes AI A Team Sport For Creators
item.description: Freepik’s announces a new Spaces offering, a shared workflow board where creatives can wire together image and video outputs in a node style interface...

item.title: Coca-Cola’s Latest Ads Fail To Make the Case For Using AI
item.description: Coca-Cola's new AI powered ads don't seem to be saving the company time or money, or making any real difference at all. And they're not alone.

item.title: Is Your Work Password On This Website? If So, Change It Now
item.description: You have been warned — change all these passwords now, before it's too late.

item.title: Saul Van Beurden On How Wells Fargo Scaled Trust, AI And Growth
item.description: Saul Van Beurden brings an engineering-led mindset to modernization and a conviction that technology is foundational to every outcome in retail bankin...

item.title: “But I didn’t know”

item.title: “I’ve got your back”
item.description: This is not a promise to be made lightly. It’s not, “I’ve got your back until it becomes difficult or inconvenient for me.” It puts us on the hook, wi...

item.title: Living in ghost cities
item.description: Cities used to die slowly. Ancient Rome, Babylon, Memphis (in Egypt) and others took generations to fade from their peaks. The reasons were easy to se...

item.title: The other kind of magic
item.description: We wait and hope for the first kind, the magic that arrives just when we need it. This is the magic of inspiration, or of good fortune. The magic of o...

item.title: Scams at scale
